name: tetris_mendacium
description:
A short puzzle game developed by klekky and sword_guy for community game jam 2019.

See the notes below for gameplay controls/tips.

A tried-and-true classic, this game will test your ability to stack blocks on top of one another. Or will it? 

As this is my first gamejam game, I really appreciate any feedback.

Thanks for playing our game!

Notes: Move using the arrow keys. Shoot (when available) using "Z". If you ever get stuck, press "R" to die.  Weighted switches (the red(4), orange(3), and yellow(2) X's) require you to be a certain size when standing up on them to activate.
